description: This file defines a bottom navigation controller (`BottomNavController`) and a widget (`OceanBottomNavBar`) for rendering a bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Dashboard, Consult, Records, Profile) in a Flutter application.

classes.name: BottomNavController
classes.description: A controller class extending ChangeNotifier to manage and notify updates of the selected bottom navigation tab index.

classes.name: OceanBottomNavBar
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a Material 3 NavigationBar with four destination tabs for navigation within the app.

methods.name: setIndex
methods.description: Updates the selected navigation index if it differs from the current index and notifies listeners.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the bottom navigation bar with current selection and tap callback.
